original_text: As they were coming down the mountain, Jesus instructed them, “Don’t tell anyone what you have seen, until the Son of Man has been raised from the dead.”
korean_text: 그들이 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 명하여 이르시되 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나기 전에는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니

sentences.original_text: As they were coming down the mountain
Don't tell anyone what you have seen
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 본 것을 아무에게도 말하지 말라

sentences.original_text: until the Son of Man has been raised from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아날 때까지
